channel.title: Port Forwarding Help
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left]I dont have a router.Im using cable and modem.[/shadow]
Hello people whenever i try to port forward and i check the open port check tool it says it cant see the port open. I use windows firewall and i goto advanced settings and create an inbound and outbound rule to open the port but it doesn't seem to work.Any one who can help me.I have teamviewer if that helps.PLZ HELP ME.[EDIT]Please help when i get the RSPS port forwarded ill release an awesome server :confused: :D
